name: Ryanair
description: Ryanair is an Irish low-cost airline founded in 1984. It is known for its low fares and extensive route network across Europe.

name: EasyJet
description: EasyJet is a British low-cost carrier headquartered at London Luton Airport. It operates domestic and international scheduled services on over 1,000 routes in more than 30 countries.

name: Southwest Airlines
description: Southwest Airlines is the world's largest low-cost carrier, based in the United States. Known for its flexible ticketing options and free checked bags policy.

name: AirAsia
description: AirAsia is a Malaysian low-cost airline known for its extensive network in Asia. It offers no-frills service at competitive prices.

name: JetBlue
description: JetBlue is a low-cost airline based in New York City, known for offering more amenities than typical low-cost carriers. It provides in-flight entertainment and free snacks.

name: Spirit Airlines
description: Spirit Airlines is an American ultra-low-cost carrier headquartered in Florida. It is known for its low base fares and extensive optional services.

name: Norwegian Air Shuttle
description: Norwegian Air Shuttle is a Norwegian low-cost airline known for its extensive European network. It also operates long-haul flights to the Americas and Asia.

name: Wizz Air
description: Wizz Air is a Hungarian low-cost airline with a focus on Central and Eastern Europe. It offers low fares and a young fleet of Airbus aircraft.

name: Vueling
description: Vueling is a Spanish low-cost airline based in Barcelona. It operates a large number of routes within Europe and to some destinations in Africa and the Middle East.

name: Scoot
description: Scoot is a Singaporean low-cost airline and a subsidiary of Singapore Airlines. It operates flights to various destinations across Asia and Australia.

name: Frontier Airlines
description: Frontier Airlines is an American ultra-low-cost carrier based in Denver, Colorado. It is known for its low fares and additional charges for services.

name: Allegiant Air
description: Allegiant Air is an American low-cost airline that focuses on leisure travelers. It offers low fares and operates charter and scheduled flights.

name: IndiGo
description: IndiGo is an Indian low-cost airline headquartered in Gurgaon. It is the largest airline in India by passengers carried and fleet size.

name: Peach Aviation
description: Peach Aviation is a Japanese low-cost airline and a subsidiary of All Nippon Airways. It operates flights to domestic and international destinations from its base in Osaka.

name: Cebu Pacific
description: Cebu Pacific is a Philippine low-cost airline headquartered in Manila. It operates extensive domestic and international routes.

name: Tigerair Australia
description: Tigerair Australia was an Australian low-cost airline and a subsidiary of Virgin Australia. It ceased operations in 2020.

name: Flydubai
description: Flydubai is a government-owned low-cost airline in Dubai, UAE. It operates flights to destinations in the Middle East, Africa, Asia, and Europe.

name: VivaAerobus
description: VivaAerobus is a Mexican low-cost airline based in Monterrey. It is known for offering low fares and a pay-for-what-you-use pricing model.

name: Volaris
description: Volaris is a Mexican low-cost airline headquartered in Mexico City. It operates domestic and international flights to the United States, Central America, and South America.
